details.address: 917 Central Ave Unit B, Charlotte, NC 28204
details.description: Sip City Market & Bottle Shop is Charlotte’s go-to destination for craft beer, fine wine, and non-alcoholic beverages—plus a versatile event space perfect for private parties, birthday celebrations, bridal showers, game nights, and more. Located in the heart of the city, we offer build-your-own 6-packs, rotating beer and wine tastings, and a welcoming community vibe. Open late every night, Sip City combines a curated drink selection with a unique venue for unforgettable experiences.

raw_data.description: Sip City Market & Bottle Shop is Charlotte’s go-to destination for craft beer, fine wine, and non-alcoholic beverages—plus a versatile event space perfect for private parties, birthday celebrations, bridal showers, game nights, and more. Located in the heart of the city, we offer build-your-own 6-packs, rotating beer and wine tastings, and a welcoming community vibe. Open late every night, Sip City combines a curated drink selection with a unique venue for unforgettable experiences.

reviews_data.review_text:
Sip City is a dope space. The people are friendly and it's a combination of an event space, a coffee shop, a bar, a place to play board games, and relax, a place for snacks, etc.
Really anything can happen here. There are even household trinkets and local art pieces for sale. They fit a lot into a space that seems from the outside, like a hole in the wall, but it's a lot larger than it looks, and it's always got a good cozy vibe.
Such an outstanding business! I hosted a celebration in the rear event space. The owner is such a kind person and makes it so easy to book! Truly such a wonderful business. Thank you Yaz!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so much Kass! Absolutely love having you at Sip City ❤️

reviews_data.review_text:
I live on the street right behind Sip City, and we love this place! I don’t come often, but when I do there’s always a fantastic beer selection and the vibe is chill and welcoming.

I’ve seen how much this business has grown since opening and I’m very impressed. Kudos to the owners and thank you for running such a great business on my street!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Omg Taylor!! 😍 thank you so so much, means the world to hear that! We’ve worked so hard to grow it and couldn’t do it without your support 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Can’t say enough about HOW AWESOME THIS SPOT IS! Great selection of drinks and always everyone who works here is so nice and helpful! I go here about once a week and can’t recommend enough! Great deals and great people!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Grace!!!! Thank you so so much for this amazing review! LOVE seeing you every time you walk in our doors! 💕💕

reviews_data.review_text: i love sip city! the owner is such a kind person and encourages community. it’s a wonderful thing to see! they have INCREDIBLE DEALS! 20% of build your own six pack is so great and mellow mondays there’s even more great deals! their THC bloody mary makes me drool and i think about it every day.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We love you very much too Kelly! Thanks for all your love and support for Sip City 🤗💕

reviews_data.review_text: I love it here. It feels like home!!!! Love the vibes love the vino 🍷!!! Love the people that work there!!! The owner is beyond awesome!
reviews_data.owner_answer: LETTY!! Thank you so so much for the amazing review!!! Love having you at Sip City and always look forward to seeing you 💕💕

reviews_data.review_text: Enjoyed my time & wine 🍷
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Liz!! Love having you here and showing you all kinds of new wines 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: One star review for trying to be the morality police. The pendulum has swung so far that a customer can't look at another person for 2 seconds longer than the cashier deems appropriate without being denied service. He did not approach her, follow her or say a word. You completely over reacted, got a bad review and then posted the footage and tried to insinuate that he's some kind of predator and threat to women for looking at someone? This is absurd! Boycott this place before it's your eyes on trial next!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Don’t need to be morality police to protect my employees against sexual harassment. You’re clearly stressed someone might call out your “normal” behavior too!

reviews_data.review_text: Rented their back room for my birthday on 7/29/2025. The staff and Yaz are so accommodating and inclusive that you feel like one of the gang. If you want chill vibes, staff that make you feel at home, and the best beverage selection, I cannot recommend this place enough.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Ian!!!! Wow! Thank you so so much for this review!! Truly loved having you and your friends and will do it all over again any time! You were so sweet to share the best desserts ever with us! Much love ❤️

reviews_data.review_text: Even before I was a patron, I appreciated Yaz as a a local business owner. He was always nice, welcoming. Now as a patron and a local business owner, we collab and there is no better human. Plus, his space is truly cool and chill offering soo much and he supports other local businesses. He gets it!
reviews_data.owner_answer: ASHLEY!! This is so so sweet! Thank you so much for the awesome review! You & Trey are truly such amazing people! So thankful to have you at Sip City! 💕💕

reviews_data.review_text: Great local spot with personable staff.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so much Julie!!! Love having you at Sip City!!! 💕💕💕

reviews_data.review_text: One of my favorite spots in Charlotte! Incredible selection of drinks and snacks, dog friendly, and the owner and staff are always so welcoming and helpful! I love that their event space is free to book! 10/10
reviews_data.owner_answer: You are an incredible human! Thank you so much for the amazing review! 💕💕💕

reviews_data.review_text:
safe and inviting atmosphere, lovely staff. i enjoy the community events they have here. it’s even a vibe to come by yourself!!
there’s a lot of non alcoholic options amidst their vast selection of drinks so there’s something here for everyone 😍 if you get the chance to try their baklava please do!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Ahhh thank you so so much Haley!!! This is such a sweet review!! Love having having you at Sip City 💕

reviews_data.review_text:
The vibes here are immaculate. As a cali sober girl, it’s nice to have options for drinks with my friends.
Love the events here. Super welcoming and safe 💕
reviews_data.owner_answer: So much love Samantha!! Thank you so much 💕💕

reviews_data.review_text: Sip is one of my favorite places in the CLT area! Great selection and even better people! 10/10!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so much Sarah!! Love having you as part of the Sip City family! 💕

reviews_data.review_text: Great chill place to go to
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Kellan 🤗🤗🤗

reviews_data.review_text: The guy at the  cash register tonight on 8/19/2025 I’m a repeat customer and he was high note and there was a young lady cleaning up and I looked at her because I’m always aware of my surroundings and he said he’s has kids he was profiling on me and drinking CBD drinks. He didn’t like the way I looked at her and he became a problem because he didn’t like the way I looked at her. I said I’m trying to make a purchase and leave. He should be fired and terminated this having about 8:18 PM and he was very disrespectful and rude and he won’t let me purchase more product I would no do business at this place again! Everything is on video surveillance cameras.
I've been coming here basically since it opened, and it is THE plaza community spot. Love the people, and the drinks don't hurt either.<3
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Austin! We love you too, you are an amazing part of it ❤️

reviews_data.review_text: I moved to Charlotte a little over a year ago and Sip has become my second home! One of my first nights in the city, I ventured to Sip to meet some of my best friends and be welcomed with open arms. Yaz not only is a wonderful person, but he knows his stuff when it comes to products. He also has found amazing staff (shoutout to Elisa, Emma, and Abe) who will absolutely make sure you’re taken care of in his absence. Come for the selection, stay for the vibes. So thankful to have stumbled upon this little local gem.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Jennnaaa 😭 this is the sweetest thing ever!!! So thankful you found Sip City and became part of our family! Love you to the moon and back!!! ❤️❤️

reviews_data.review_text: Love love love Sip City and regularly spend time here! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for chill vibes, a cool event space or unique drink options.
reviews_data.owner_answer: LOVE YOU SO MUCH Savannah! We are truly so lucky to have someone so loving and caring be a regular of Sip City ❤️❤️

reviews_data.review_text: My recent experience involving Sip City was extremely difficult. While I cannot disclose specific legal details, I can share that a judge, after hearing the evidence, acknowledged that they were very close to granting a protective order. This statement from the court speaks volumes about the concerning nature of the situation. I would urge anyone considering engaging with Sip City to proceed with extreme caution and conduct thorough due diligence. My experience was unsettling, and I hope this review helps others avoid similar distress.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Zak was previously contracted as an art coordinator, he’s no longer in role. He also lost a legal case in court on 7/17 claiming harassment meanwhile he is leaving negative reviews & falsely claiming we slandered him on social media when we have not. Check out our instagram post for more info @Sipcityclt

reviews_data.review_text: My favorite neighborhood bar and bottle shop.  Very welcoming environment, the owner Yaz is one of the best.  Great selection of wine, beer, alternative beverages, as well as snacks.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so much for the amazing review Courtney!!! I absolutely love having you and Vince as one of our regulars and Sip City fam 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: I got out of work a bit early and was in the area and wanted to stop by for a beer. They have an unbelievable selection of beverages, draft beers, and THC drinks as well. Absolutely will start coming here often. The owner Yaz is awesome too!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so much for the amazing review Dante ❤️ so thankful to have met you! Always looking forward to seeing you

reviews_data.review_text: Got my tarot read and she said I was a young hustler. Owner a real nice guy too.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Trevor, so sorry for the late response. Looking forward to having you visit us again ❤️

reviews_data.review_text: Great beer selection and space. Has a back patio and great coffee as well. Had the ritual before I headed out. The homemade cardamon syrup was amazing. Flavors had me feeling like I was back in the Levant. The crossaint caprese was delicious as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Emnet!!! It was so nice meeting you and loved serving you 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Top spot in Charlotte - can't beat the vibes. Amazing selection, too.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so so much Sean!!! So happy you’ve become part of the family! 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: I hosted a bridal shower at Sip City. I was in touch with Yaz and he was great! We had a party of 15, but the space could easily hold 4 times that! We had a delicious mocktail and spanakopita, purchased from Sip City. We were able to bring in our own food, and arrange the space as we needed. I would definitely recommend Sip City for your next event!
reviews_data.owner_answer: OMG LInda!!! Thank you so so much for this amazing review and lovely photos!! Your event looked absolutely beautiful and we are so excited for you & your family!! Congratulations again and looking forward to seeing you all again soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: Great hand selected wines, cocktails, seltzers, beer and coffee- a little bit of everything. Hosted a book club night out at Sip City &really enjoyed the atmosphere. Owner &staff were very welcoming and accommodating. Looking forward to visiting again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the amazing review!!! We look forward to having you join us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Cool spot with drinks, snacks, popcorn and seating
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the 5 star review Elijah!! Excited to have you back!!

reviews_data.review_text:
I thoroughly enjoy the Sip City experience. Whether it's enjoying a glass of wine or coffee ☕️ this gem in Plaza Midwood is an exceptional place to have a book club meet up or afternoon meeting.
My business had the pleasure of having a vendor event at Sip City, as they have a nice size area in the back for events. The owners are 2 amazing young men & are a staple to Plaza Midwood.
We'll see you soon!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the amazing review Raenae!!! We always love seeing you at Sip City!

reviews_data.review_text: This place honestly deserves 10 stars, with all that they do. I used to go to the wine tasting and comedy night on Wednesdays, and the staff was always very friendly and welcoming. They are knowledgeable about the wine and beer they carry, and Yaz has clearly poured his heart and soul into the place to make it comfortable and fun for everyone. Recently, they had gone WAY above and beyond. I needed a last-minute Christmas gift for someone who I found out to be sober. I remembered Sip City offering NA cocktails, so I reached out on the off chance that I might be able to get something in time. Yaz got back to me within 20 minutes and was sending me different gift options and even went to check on the shipping options for me. Unfortunately, UPS was going to be a bit pricey, so he got me in touch with the company that makes the cocktails to order from them directly. I can't say enough about how wonderful this place is!
reviews_data.owner_answer: OMG Cici!! So sorry I'm just now seeing this!! This just made my day, I can read your review over and over and over again!! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience!!! <3

reviews_data.review_text: Hands down the best
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Vibhav! Love having you as part of the Sip City Fam!

reviews_data.review_text: Wow!! I can’t say enough about the amazing experience we had hosting our annual staff winter social at Sip City! The space was perfect for our event. We had about 50 staff persons at the event, and the space was more than sufficient! The staff of Sip City were fantastic, and so helpful. They anticipated our every need, and even made accommodations for our particular needs. I highly recommend booking Sip City for your event!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review, Chad! We’re so happy you chose us for your annual staff winter social. We can’t wait to see you and your team at Sip City again and look forward to hosting your future events 🤗🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Sip City is one of our favorite hangout spots in Plaza. Service is great, beer and wine selection is spectacular, and the comedy nights are amazing! If ever in Plaza you should definitely check it out!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: You are truly so amazing for this awesome review Izzy! Thank you so much and can't wait to see you again at Sip City! :)

reviews_data.review_text: Great vibes great selection - you'll want to hang all day
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so so so much for this awesome review Katherine!! Can't wait to have you join us again at Sip City! :)

reviews_data.review_text: This place is awesome! Good place to chill any time of day.
reviews_data.owner_answer: YOU are awesome Kale! Thank you so much! Join us anytime!

reviews_data.review_text: Sip city has a wide variety of drinks. There was ample amount of seating. The staff was very friendly. Great margaritas and a good time!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: You are so amazing Brittany! Thank you so much and so happy you enjoyed your time and margaritas :)

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome drink selection, great suggestions and custom THC drink by Austin, variety of games and cute patio. A very fun and unique spot
reviews_data.owner_answer: 😍😍 thank you so much Laura for this amazing review! So happy to hear you enjoyed our selection and patio! Excited to have you join us again 🤗🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped in for a pint and 6 pack for my fridge. Super chill place and great spot to drink a beer early in the day. Good selection of cans in the fridges. The staff is friendly and the place was clean. I didn’t get any food but the sandwiches being made behind the counter looked really good.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hey Matthew, thank you so much for this amazing review! Glad you enjoyed your beer, and excited to hear how you like your 6 pack! 
Yesss the croissant caprese is a fan favorite, definitely check it out! 🤗🤗 thanks for the cute photos too!

reviews_data.review_text:
I finally visited Sip City yesterday after seeing some of their social media posts. Even though we recently moved closer to Huntersville, I just had to come support this fantastic small business!

The atmosphere here is super chill, with great music playing and an impressive variety of options. It brought back memories of our favorite bottle shop near home.

I’m already looking forward to coming back during the holidays—the dark sky and twinkling building lights will create the perfect cozy vibe for a get-together. Can't wait!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Devon!!! Thank you so so muvh for this amazing review!!! So happy you were able to join us and we really appreciate you taking the time to come in from Huntersville 😊 excited to have uou join us again and again 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Absolute TRASH!! Sheer disrespect and appalling service!! Will never recommend or visit this place again... HIGHLY ADVISE ALL STAY AWAY
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Frank, I think you may have the wrong business, we are a small business with a small team of 3 and we’re all very polite and friendly, none of us recall anyone having a bad experience, could you give us more details? When did you visit us? What happened?

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely love Sip City Market & Bottle Shop in Charlotte, North Carolina!! I can’t believe it took us this long to try it. Such a great cool space. Lots of fun artwork and seating. There’s even a record player with records! They have about eight beers on draft as well as a ton of cans from many geeky breweries. They also have wines by the glass, as well as by the bottle- both cold and warm! They also had tons of other nonalcoholic drinks as well as alcoholic seltzers! I had a really really good one from Suffolk Punch! Had a super clean bathroom where you could draw on the walls and they’re super dog friendly. The highlight of our visit was Austin. He was so friendly, accommodating, knowledgeable and swift! We loved talking to him and learning about the shop and all the different items! Cannot wait to go back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi HJC, thank you so so so much for this amazing review! Beyond happy to hear about your experience and that Austin took great care of you! Can’t wait to have you visit us at again 🤗🤗🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Sip City is the bomb! Been living in Plaza for a while and this place should be on everyone's list to frequent. Local brews, and great vibes. The owner is always so welcoming and passionate about his customers experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review Kyle!! Loved having you and your fiancé at Sip City and definitely looking forward to having you join us again soon 😋🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Highly recommend!! This is my go to spot in the neighborhood. Always good vibes, pet friendly and an extensive beverage selection.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the amazing review Bell! We love having you as a regular at Sip City 😋🤗

reviews_data.review_text: We came to sip city for drinks with friends and the staff members were so friendly! Great atmosphere for drinks and conversation. As someone that is gluten free, there was a fantastic wine selection and my husband loved the beers. When it was time to walk home (in the rain) the owner handed us all ponchos and thanked us for coming! We had a great experience and will definitely be supporting this business again.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Awww!!! Thank you so much Anna!! So happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Sip City and definitely can’t wait to have you, Hayden and your friends back again! We have new drinks weekly and a complimentary wine tasting every Wednesday 7-9 pm as well as a complimentary beer tasting every Thursday 7-9 pm!

reviews_data.review_text: If you find yourself in Charlotte, this spot is an absolute must! Visiting for work has led me to discover this incredible shop that I just can’t get enough of. The staff is unbelievably friendly, always greeting you with a smile. They offer fantastic events and daily specials—personally, I’m hooked on Mellow Monday and Wednesday comedy nights. And let’s talk about their drink selection—unmatched, especially their CBD/THC options! A solid 1000/10 experience!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Woww you are truly amazing, thank you for the phenomenal review, we’re so lucky you found us while you were in Charlotte! Love the good vibes you bring!

reviews_data.review_text: Great vibes, great coffee. New favorite spot
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Justin!! Happy to have you as part of the Sip City fam!

reviews_data.review_text: Yaz was such a great host, super friendly and accommodating! We'll definitely be back when in Charlotte. Thanks Yaz!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Andy!! Enjoyed having you at Sip City and can’t wait to have you back again next time you’re in Charlotte 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Wow! What a concept. This place is genius. It’s like Starbucks with alcoholic beverages instead of coffee! Austin was the best!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: 😍😍😍 thank you so much for the amazing review CW!!! Excited for you to visit us again and again 🤗🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Perfect spot to work or even chill with a few friends.  Great staff and awesome drink selections.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the amazing review Marques!! We love having you at Sip City 😊🤗

reviews_data.review_text: This has become the neighborhood living room; where everyone comes and chills out.  Artwork for sale, wide selection of drinks, homemade ice cream, lots of cool events.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the amazing review Ron! We love having you and Kristine here, you always bring great energy! 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Really living up to its potential. The bartender is always down for a good conversation
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the amazing review Lynette!!! Always down with that, and you’re a great person to converse with!! 🤗🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Aesthetic is crazy
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Shikhal! 🤗

reviews_data.review_text:
I will preface this with I do not live in the Charlotte area; however, I'm visiting friends for the weekend and found this relaxing little coffee shop to chill out in for a bit while I wake up.

The guy behind the counter was super friendly and very accommodating. There's not a vast variety of flavors, but there's enough to be interesting, and most of them are made in-house. I didn't try the alcohol, but there's a good selection from what I saw. He also has a smattering of breakfast foods available. I tried the croissant caprese, which was fresh and delicious. If I had to guess, this shop looks like a local secret worth sharing.

I look forward to coming back here on future trips.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Shawn, Thank you so much for this amazing review!!! So happy to hear you enjoyed your experience and definitely looking forward to having you join us again on your next trip to Charlotte! Our alcohol selection is rotating weekly so you’ll definitely find some delicious drinks every time you visit us 🤗

reviews_data.review_text: My favorite bottle shop in Charlotte! Staff is always very friendly and welcoming and my dogs love going just as much as I do! Thanks for such a welcoming environment, I love the feeling of community and how this spots brings plaza midwood folks together so effortlessly!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Demi! We love seeing you and your fur babies!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is a vibe .. they have a great unique selections of beers to pick from,with seating and games to relax and enjoy so chit chat with friends, I like.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Ci Ci!! Welcome to the Sip City family 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Great selection of NA beverages
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Sara!!! We love seeing you at Sip City 😊

reviews_data.review_text: My wife and I stopped by here one evening while in Charlotte for their Sunday Funday event. The beer and wine were great. An inviting space, not crowded which is something that not easily avoided in the area. A must stop for a nice drink, delicious snack, and relaxed space to unwind.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you very much Darien!! It was very nice meeting you & your lovely wife! Thank you for the awesome review, looking forward to having you over again soon! 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Services great and I love the variety of gift ideas available for purchase and the tacos were good
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you very much for the awesome review Tekele :) Looking forward to having you back at Sip City again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I loved attending this outing to Sip Market! I loved the culture and the family , the culture runs deep. I do believe they may be used to slower paced or smaller events so there was a slight wait on food due to the rush of the offline event, nonetheless the staff was very communicative and the location made the wait enjoyable. At some point in the night, even the owner’s father was chatting with me. Sweet people, and even better food. I would certainly visit on a one off.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you so much Ximara, this is such a sweet review! We definitely 
look forward to seeing you again! 😊

reviews_data.review_text: We had the pleasure of visiting this charming place, and it truly is an adorable gem! The atmosphere is wonderfully cozy and laid back, creating a relaxing and chill vibe. Their wide selection of gift items and beverages left us excited to return and try more. What stood out the most was the super-friendly staff who were not only welcoming but also readily available to answer our questions. Overall, it was a fantastic experience that I can't wait to repeat.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Michelle!!! We’re very thankful you had a great experience and can’t wait to see you again at Sip City 😊🤗

reviews_data.review_text: Hands down The best bottle shop in CLT.  Yaz has created an environment that’s fun for families / friends to come in, grab a drink and stay for a while. It’s quickly become our families go-to spot (our girls who are 5 and 3 love going there!) and our friends  love meeting us over there too! They’ve just added cozy leather chairs that make it easy to unwind and relax. Games throughout on each table and live music on Fridays. We are always treated as if we’re family - Yaz, Kiya and Austen truly go above and beyond for their customers.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Misty!!!! Literally tearing up in happiness reading this!!! Thank you so much!! You are 100% family!! It's been so fun getting to know you and your family! Can't wait to see you all again soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: Great local place to visit. The owner and staff are amazing!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Robert, it was a pleasure having you at Sip City 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Was asked by manager not to speak to people at other tables. (Friendly conversation, mostly to other people with dogs) I thought going out to meet people with similar interests was the intent. Not here. Beer selection is marginal at best, and their packaged beer is overpriced. Only came out due to proximity to my house. There are MANY better places to go. Need suggestions, feel free to ask.

Awesome spot. Tucked between Seventh Sin & Two Scoops, this place was delightful. Yaz (owner) was super nice, and the store/restaurant/bar is well stocked. The chicken shawarma wrap was awesome, and the new sour I tried from their fridge case is my new favorite. They also host music and other events so I can’t wait to bring my girlfriend in to try too.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Jordan!!! Truly enjoyed having you at Sip City and chatting with you. We got 3 new amazing sours in this Friday, stop by when you’re free 🤤😊

reviews_data.review_text: Food was good. Decent selection of beer, plenty of parking since able to park in the school lot. Will be back
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Caleb! Excited to have you back soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: We had a great experience at Sip City! Great atmosphere and drinks on tap. It definitely has a community vibe.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the 5 stars Sarah!! We love the community vibe more than anything in the world tbh!! We host lots of cool community events weekly such as free wine tastings 6-9 pm on Wednesdays, free beer tastings on Thursdays 6-9 pm, live music on Fridays, music bingo/trivia on Tuesdays and lots of other fun events such as Sip & Paint, comedy nights etc.

reviews_data.review_text: everything about this place is a hit!! they have a wide variety of drinks for a great price, all the snacks you could ask for/a food truck in the back, fun games on every table, and amazing customer service!! the owner yaz is so friendly and you can tell he loves what he does. this has become a regular spot for my friend group and we are so grateful to have found it!!

reviews_data.review_text:
Hey y'all, let me tell you about my absolute favorite spot in Charlotte, not just because I live right by it… (is it too early to mention they do a 10% discount for folks that live within walking distance away), Sip City Market and Bottle Shop. I relocated to Charlotte just over a year ago, and stumbling upon this hidden gem has been an absolute delight. Let me paint you a picture of the warm and inviting experience you'll find here.

First off, the team at Sip City is simply amazing. From the moment you step inside, Renee or Nick (the manager) greet you with genuine smiles and a welcoming vibe. They make you feel like a part of their little family, and that's something truly special. And let's not forget about the young and passionate owner, Yaz. His dedication and love for what he does shines through in every detail of this place. It’s rare that you get to witness someone who is watching their dreams come true. His simple but infectious joy is contagious for his “baby” coming to life.

Now, let's talk about the ambiance. Sip City is housed in a quaint location that exudes charm. They did a great and quaint job of making it feel cute but comfy but also trendy. The live music on some nights is a personal favorite of mine. Picture yourself sipping on your favorite beer or wine, because let’s be honest they carry a LOT, and if Yaz doesn’t have it… he will acquire it for you… back to what I was saying,  swaying to the soulful tunes, and just letting go of all your worries with smiling folks both employees and parishioners. It's the perfect way to unwind and enjoy a night out.

And Sundays? Oh boy, you're in for a treat! They host these fantastic events where local vendors set up shop, offering all sorts of interesting items. It's like a mini flea market, right in the heart of Plaza Midwood. You can browse unique treasures, support local artisans, and have a great time all at once.

Speaking of drinks, Sip City doesn't disappoint. They occasionally organize beer and wine tastings that are as informative as they are enjoyable. It's a wonderful opportunity to explore new flavors and expand your palate. But here's the best part—they cater to all tastes! If you're not into alcoholic beverages, fear not. Sip City has a delightful selection of non-alcoholic options that are equally refreshing.

Now, let's head outside to their back patio/lot. The addition of a food truck has taken things to a whole new level. Imagine sitting under the open sky, enjoying delicious bites from the food truck while sipping your favorite drink, and enjoying some outdoor seating especially if it’s not too hot. And did I mention they are pet and family-friendly? It's a great spot to spend quality time with your loved ones, including the furry ones!

Oh, and if you're up for some good old-fashioned fun, Sip City has got you covered. They have an impressive collection of board games that you can enjoy while savoring your drinks. It's a perfect way to engage with friends or make new ones in this cozy and inviting atmosphere.

And let's not forget, Sip City is also a retail shop. So, if you find a beverage you absolutely adore, you can take it home with you, They also have many amazing retail items for sale at a great price.

All in all, Sip City Market and Bottle Shop is a place that has won my heart. The welcoming and considerate team, the live music, the Sunday events, the beer and wine tastings, the food truck, the outdoor seating, the non-alcoholic options, the meat and cheese/ sandwich options, the pet and family-friendly environment, and the board games—it's all here! So, whether you're a local or just passing through, make sure you pay a visit to Sip City. Trust me, you won't regret it.

Cheers to Yaz and his incredible team for creating such a special place in our beloved neighborhood! I love Charlotte but this place is the most at home and comfortable I’ve felt in a year. Thanks team, I’m soooo very grateful.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely love Sip City Market & Bottle Shop in Charlotte, North Carolina!! I can’t believe it took us this long to try it. Such a great cool space. Lots of fun artwork and seating. There’s even a record player with records! They have about eight beers on draft as well as a ton of cans from many geeky breweries. They also have wines by the glass, as well as by the bottle- both cold and warm! They also had tons of other nonalcoholic drinks as well as alcoholic seltzers! I had a really really good one from Suffolk Punch! Had a super clean bathroom where you could draw on the walls and they’re super dog friendly. The highlight of our visit was Austin. He was so friendly, accommodating, knowledgeable and swift! We loved talking to him and learning about the shop and all the different items! Cannot wait to go back!

reviews_data.review_text:
Hey y'all, let me tell you about my absolute favorite spot in Charlotte, not just because I live right by it… (is it too early to mention they do a 10% discount for folks that live within walking distance away), Sip City Market and Bottle Shop. I relocated to Charlotte just over a year ago, and stumbling upon this hidden gem has been an absolute delight. Let me paint you a picture of the warm and inviting experience you'll find here.

First off, the team at Sip City is simply amazing. From the moment you step inside, Renee or Nick (the manager) greet you with genuine smiles and a welcoming vibe. They make you feel like a part of their little family, and that's something truly special. And let's not forget about the young and passionate owner, Yaz. His dedication and love for what he does shines through in every detail of this place. It’s rare that you get to witness someone who is watching their dreams come true. His simple but infectious joy is contagious for his “baby” coming to life.

Now, let's talk about the ambiance. Sip City is housed in a quaint location that exudes charm. They did a great and quaint job of making it feel cute but comfy but also trendy. The live music on some nights is a personal favorite of mine. Picture yourself sipping on your favorite beer or wine, because let’s be honest they carry a LOT, and if Yaz doesn’t have it… he will acquire it for you… back to what I was saying,  swaying to the soulful tunes, and just letting go of all your worries with smiling folks both employees and parishioners. It's the perfect way to unwind and enjoy a night out.

And Sundays? Oh boy, you're in for a treat! They host these fantastic events where local vendors set up shop, offering all sorts of interesting items. It's like a mini flea market, right in the heart of Plaza Midwood. You can browse unique treasures, support local artisans, and have a great time all at once.

Speaking of drinks, Sip City doesn't disappoint. They occasionally organize beer and wine tastings that are as informative as they are enjoyable. It's a wonderful opportunity to explore new flavors and expand your palate. But here's the best part—they cater to all tastes! If you're not into alcoholic beverages, fear not. Sip City has a delightful selection of non-alcoholic options that are equally refreshing.

Now, let's head outside to their back patio/lot. The addition of a food truck has taken things to a whole new level. Imagine sitting under the open sky, enjoying delicious bites from the food truck while sipping your favorite drink, and enjoying some outdoor seating especially if it’s not too hot. And did I mention they are pet and family-friendly? It's a great spot to spend quality time with your loved ones, including the furry ones!

Oh, and if you're up for some good old-fashioned fun, Sip City has got you covered. They have an impressive collection of board games that you can enjoy while savoring your drinks. It's a perfect way to engage with friends or make new ones in this cozy and inviting atmosphere.

And let's not forget, Sip City is also a retail shop. So, if you find a beverage you absolutely adore, you can take it home with you, They also have many amazing retail items for sale at a great price.

All in all, Sip City Market and Bottle Shop is a place that has won my heart. The welcoming and considerate team, the live music, the Sunday events, the beer and wine tastings, the food truck, the outdoor seating, the non-alcoholic options, the meat and cheese/ sandwich options, the pet and family-friendly environment, and the board games—it's all here! So, whether you're a local or just passing through, make sure you pay a visit to Sip City. Trust me, you won't regret it.

Cheers to Yaz and his incredible team for creating such a special place in our beloved neighborhood! I love Charlotte but this place is the most at home and comfortable I’ve felt in a year. Thanks team, I’m soooo very grateful.
